attributes.title: Chapter 1
attributes.description: Project Freelancer sends a Recovery Force to Outpost 17-B in hopes of finding out what happened there.

attributes.title: Chapter 2
attributes.description: Agent Washington arrives at Blood Gulch and is greeted by some familiar faces.

attributes.title: Chapter 3
attributes.description: It's tragedy at Outpost 28 when somebody dies at the hands of an old acquaintance.

attributes.title: Chapter 4
attributes.description: Caboose helps Wash in pursuit of the elusive Meta.

attributes.title: Chapter 5
attributes.description: Caboose and Church help Wash when he encounters resistance from others in his investigation.

attributes.title: Chapter 6
attributes.description: The Meta goes on the offensive as Agent South finds herself in a lot of trouble.

attributes.title: Chapter 7
attributes.description: The one where everybody enjoys the exposition.

attributes.title: Chapter 8
attributes.description: Wash continues his search for the Meta.

attributes.title: Chapter 9
attributes.description: Sarge sets out on an important mission.

attributes.title: Chapter 10
attributes.description: Washington is forced to confront the Reds.

attributes.title: Chapter 12
attributes.description: Church tries to explain his unusual condition to Wash.

attributes.title: Chapter 13
attributes.description: The team tries to secure a vehicle for their upcoming assault on Command.

attributes.title: Chapter 14
attributes.description: When the vehicle acquisition goes awry, Wash is forced to take matters into his own hands.

attributes.title: Chapter 15
attributes.description: The team is forced to split up in order to infiltrate command.

attributes.title: Chapter 16
attributes.description: Wash explains the origins of Project Freelancer while Church struggles with the images he's receiving from the Epsilon AI. Meanwhile, the Reds hatch a diabolical plan.

attributes.title: Chapter 17
attributes.description: The Reds continue their industrial espionage while Church copes with recent revelations.

attributes.title: Chapter 18
attributes.description: Under attack from Recovery agents, the Reds and Blues regroup and begin to hatch their final plan.

attributes.title: Chapter 19
attributes.description: The final chapter of Red vs Blue Reconstruction.
